first_para: Mickey Brady (born 7 October 1950) MLA is a nationalist politician in Northern Ireland. He was elected in 2007 to the Northern Ireland Assembly as a Sinn Féin member for Newry & Armagh and re-elected in 2011. He is standing in the Newry and Armagh Westminster Parliament constituency in the 2015 general election.

full.extract: Mickey Brady (born 7 October 1950) MLA is a nationalist politician in Northern Ireland. He was elected in 2007 to the Northern Ireland Assembly as a Sinn Féin member for Newry & Armagh and re-elected in 2011. He is standing in the Newry and Armagh Westminster Parliament constituency in the 2015 general election.
full.title: Mickey Brady
